description: User requests an upper‑body strength‑building plan. The coach fetches recent fitness data, checks for constraints, generates a personalized split routine, and delivers the detailed weekly workout schedule.

messages.content: You are VitalFit Coach, an agentic LLM that acts as a personal health coach. You have access to tools for fetching fitness data, logging meals, getting nutrition info, generating workout and meal plans, checking medical guidelines, and producing progress reports. Respond with empathy, be concise, and always back recommendations with the latest data you retrieve.

Hey VitalFit, I want to start a strength‑building program that focuses on my upper body. I have a slight shoulder discomfort from a past injury, so please keep the routine safe. Give me a split routine for the next week.
Got it! I’ll first pull your recent fitness‑tracker data to see your current activity levels and any recent trends that could affect the plan.
Thanks for waiting. Based on your recent activity (moderate steps, good sleep, and light cardio), I’ll now generate a safe upper‑body strength split that respects your shoulder discomfort.

constraints: shoulder discomfort - avoid heavy overhead pressing

messages.content: {"plan_name": "Upper‑Body Strength Split (7‑Day)", "weekly_schedule": [{"day": "Monday", "focus": "Push (Chest & Triceps)", "exercises": [{"name": "Incline Dumbbell Press", "sets": 3, "reps": "10‑12", "notes": "Use moderate weight, stop if shoulder hurts"}, {"name": "Dumbbell Flyes", "sets": 3, "reps": "12‑15", "notes": "Control the motion"}, {"name": "Triceps Rope Push‑down", "sets": 3, "reps": "12‑15", "notes": "Keep elbows close"}]}, {"day": "Tuesday", "focus": "Pull (Back & Biceps)", "exercises": [{"name": "Seated Cable Row", "sets": 3, "reps": "10‑12"}, {"name": "Lat Pulldown (neutral grip)", "sets": 3, "reps": "10‑12"}, {"name": "Hammer Curls", "sets": 3, "reps": "12‑15"}]}, {"day": "Wednesday", "focus": "Active Recovery", "exercises": [{"name": "Foam‑roll shoulders", "duration_min": 10}, {"name": "Band pull‑apart", "sets": 2, "reps": "15"}, {"name": "Light cardio (walk)", "duration_min": 30}]}, {"day": "Thursday", "focus": "Push (Shoulder‑Friendly)", "exercises": [{"name": "Arnold Press (light)", "sets": 3, "reps": "10‑12", "notes": "Stop at mild discomfort"}, {"name": "Lateral Raises", "sets": 3, "reps": "12‑15"}, {"name": "Close‑Grip Bench Press", "sets": 3, "reps": "8‑10"}]}, {"day": "Friday", "focus": "Pull (Upper Back)", "exercises": [{"name": "Chest‑supported T‑Bar Row", "sets": 3, "reps": "10‑12"}, {"name": "Face Pulls", "sets": 3, "reps": "15"}, {"name": "Concentration Curls", "sets": 3, "reps": "12‑15"}]}, {"day": "Saturday", "focus": "Full‑Body Light Circuit", "exercises": [{"name": "Goblet Squat", "sets": 3, "reps": "12"}, {"name": "Push‑up (knees if needed)", "sets": 3, "reps": "10‑12"}, {"name": "Russian Twists", "sets": 3, "reps": "20"}]}, {"day": "Sunday", "focus": "Rest & Mobility", "exercises": [{"name": "Gentle yoga/stretching", "duration_min": 30}] ] }

Here’s your customized 7‑day upper‑body strength split. The program balances push‑pull days, includes light shoulder‑friendly movements, and builds in active recovery to protect your shoulder. Stick to the suggested rep ranges, use a weight that feels challenging but stops short of any pain, and log each workout so we can fine‑tune the plan next week. Let me know if you need any modifications or want the plan in a printable format!
